content.prompt: Which of the following architectural features of Romanesque churches developed in connection with their use as pilgrimage centers?

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
